short_definition: A criminal offense of bringing goods into a country without paying customs duties on them or bringing in goods which are prohibited by law.
long_definition_html: A criminal offense of bringing goods into a country without paying customs duties on them or bringing in goods which are prohibited by law.
long_definition_markdown: A criminal offense of bringing goods into a country without paying customs duties on them or bringing in goods which are prohibited by law.
long_definition_text: A criminal offense of bringing goods into a country without paying customs duties on them or bringing in goods which are prohibited by law.
